root.name: Traxxpad: Portable Studio
root.description: Traxxpad: Portable Studio is a music creation program for the PSP. It allows users to create music utilizing a library of over 1000 unique sounds, while also allowing a mic to be used to capture and use one's own samples. Users can also export the music they create as MP3's, allowing music to be shared with others. It has been criticized for its decidedly non-user-friendly interface, but praised for the amount of things it gives dedicated users to experiment with.
